name: WEAREHANGRY PTE. LTD.
description: Opeartor of a multi-brand delivery-only restaurant platform designed for consumers looking for a variety of food options. The company's platform offers a selection of virtual restaurants featuring local and international cuisines, enabling customers to order a wide range of meals through a user-friendly app and have them delivered directly to their location.
one_liner: Opeartor of a multi-brand delivery-only restaurant platform designed for consumers looking for a variety of food options. The company's platform offers a selection of virtual restaurants featuring local and international cuisines, enabling customers to order a wide range of meals through a user-friendly app and have them delivered directly to their location.
